None of Cassie`s Sawsbuck moves are known.

character.name: Rikioh
character.description: Ramone participated in the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round he was in the seventh match and faced off against Dawn. The match was quickly showcased and Dawn won the battle and advanced to the second round while Ramone was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Mooland (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Stoutland participated in the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the seventh match and faced off against Dawn`s Piplup. The match quickly showcased Dawn`s Piplup finishing off Ramone`s Stoutland to win the battle which allowed Dawn to advance to the second round while Ramone was eliminated from the tournament. None of Ramone`s Stoutland moves are known.

character.name: Kotetsu
character.description: Cameron is a Pokémon Trainer that planned to participate in the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup in Kagome Town but he arrived too late to participate in the competition. Ash and his friends informed him that it had just ended. While parting ways with Dawn, Cameron arrived at the boat launch obviously trying to go to the Johto region but he just missed the flight. Gym Battle Against Marlon Cameron met Marlon as he was on top of his Wailord as it came close to the beachline where Ash and Cameron were. Before the gum match, Marlon told Cameron that he`d stop him with his deep love for the sea. Marlon instructed that the Gym battles at the Seigaiha Gym are two Pokémon apiece and whoever defeats both first wins. Initially Cameron thought he did well in the battle and was going to have an easy victory in the match by quickly defeating Marlon`s Jellicent but Marlon`s tactic was revealed when Marlon`s Jellicent Ability Cursed Body disabled Cameron`s Ferrothorn Thunderbolt. Marlon`s Mantine tried to turn the tie of the battle to Marlon favor but Cameron`s Samurott was able to hold its own in the water and give the match victory to Cameron. Marlon was actually quite impress with Cameron as he was able to make the special field his own. Isshu League Tournament In the preliminary round of the Isshu League, Cameron`s Ferrothorn was matched up against Kenoh`s Eelektross and defeated it. As a result Kenoh was eliminated from the competition and Cameron advanced to the first main round. In the first main round, Bianca was matched up against Cameron. It was a two-on-two battle and Bianca`s Escavalier battled Cameron`s Samurott in the first matchup. It ended up being a defensive battle as Bianca`s Escavalier kept using Iron Defense but Cameron`s Samurott was able to counter it by using a double Razor Shell which caused percussive damage inside its body and knocked it out. Bianca`s Emboar was then sent out to battle against Cameron`s Samurott despite the obvious type advantage to Cameron. Bianca`s Emboar got baptized with Water type moves right as it was switched in and made Enbuoh lose a lot of its energy. Bianca has a secret move to help her win the match and Bianca`s Emboar used Attract to make Cameron`s Samurott infatuated with it and was then able to let off a ton of attacks unchallenged to knock it out. The final match up was between Cameron`s Riolu and Bianca`s Emboar. It was pretty one sided as Bianca`s Emboar was already pretty tired and it couldn`t land any hits. It was able to grab its foot at one point and throw it hard but Cameron`s Riolu landed on the ground upright. Cameron`s Riolu defeated Bianca`s Emboar and as a result Bianca was eliminated from the Isshu League tournament while Cameron advanced to the second round. In the second main round, Cameron`s battle was briefly shown and Cameron`s Ferrothorn was shown defeating a Morobareru. In the third round he was matched up against Kenton where he defeated him and Kenton was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Riolu (Kotetsu)
character.description: Cameron`s Riolu is Cameron main Pokémon and it resides outside of its Pokéball. It seems to be very relaxed in nature and is often seen imitating Cameron gestures. Cilan`s tasting of it noted that even as a small grain, it`s spicy and he sees it as quite a virtuoso. Isshu League Higaki Tournament Cameron`s Riolu participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the first round, Bianca was matched up against Cameron. The final match up of the battle was between Cameron`s Riolu and Bianca`s Emboar. It was pretty one sided as Bianca`s Emboar was already pretty tired and it couldn`t land any hits. It was able to grab its foot at one point and throw it hard but Cameron`s Riolu landed on the ground upright. Cameron`s Riolu defeated Bianca`s Emboar and as a result Bianca was eliminated from the Isshu League tournament while Cameron advanced to the second round. In the third round it was matched up against Kenton`s Gigalith and defeated it which resulted in Kenton being eliminated from the tournament. During the fourth round of the tournament against Ash, it evolved into Cameron`s Lucario.

character.name: Shizui
character.description: Marlon is the gym leader of the Seigaiha Gym in East Isshu. Trainers that defeat him receive the Wave Badge.

character.name: Burungel (Shizui)
character.description: Marlon`s Jellicent was the first Pokémon he used in the gym battle against Kotetsu.

character.name: Mantain (Shizui)
character.description: Marlon`s Mantine was the second and final Pokémon used in the gym battle against Kotetsu.

character.name: Whaloh (Shizui)
character.description: Marlon`s Wailord served as transportation to take Ash, Kotetsu and Marlon to the gym for the battle. Marlon was first revealed in the anime riding on top of his Wailord at it came close to the shore where Ash and Kotetsu were. None of Marlon`s Wailord`s moves were revealed in the episode.

character.name: Nutrey (Kotetsu)
character.description: Kotetsu`s Ferrothorn was the first Pokémon that Kotetsu sent out to battle against Marlon as he forgot to bring his Riolu over to the battle area. It was initially matched up against Marlon`s Jellicent.

character.name: Daikenki (Kotetsu)
character.description: Kotetsu`s Samurott was the second and final Pokémon that Kotetsu sent out to battle against Marlon. It was matched up against Marlon`s Mantine.

character.name: Waruvial (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Krookodile evolved from Ash`s Krokorok during a battle against Iris in the semi-finals round of the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup.

character.name: Leila
character.description: Leila is a teacher at a nursery school in East Isshu. She was taking a walk with some of the Pokémon from the school when she had to search for Elphoon after it got blown away by the wind. As a result, I got separated from Washibon and Valchai. Leila has the tendency to be a bit clumsy and is always tripping and falling on the ground. She`s doing her best, but she has a slightly thoughtless side to her. She admitted that she was still inexperienced and can`t even take proper care of everyone but she managed to gain the respect of both Washibon and Valchai. Despite only being their teacher for a short while, Washibon and Valchai loved her and were vying for her attention were stubbornly fighting each other but resolved some of their differences as Cilan suggested they had begun to get along with each other and Leila.

character.name: Enchou (East Isshu Hoikuen)
character.description: He is the principal of a Pokémon Nursery School in East Isshu. One of his teacher is Leila who he realized is a bit thoughtless and clumsy. He asked Cilan to be in charge while he went out to pick up some new Pokémon that would be residing at the school.

character.name: Larry
character.description: Larry lived in seclusion deep within a forest in the Isshu region with Meloetta. One day the place was discovered and while he wasn`t looking, Meloetta was captured by a group of villains. Since ancient times, he and his people have been called the Guardians, which are a group of people that guard Meloetta. The Guardians possess the power to sense Meloetta. He had been searching for a long time to find it after it was taken by the Rocket gang. When Larry heard Meloetta`s melody, he quickly followed the sound and accused Ash and his friends of stealing Meloetta. The matter was quickly resolved though and he apologized for his initial quick judgement. After Rocket Gang decided to go ahead with their "Operation Tempest", Larry helped out the group defeat Rocket Gang. He was able to control the Reveal Glass and requested that it soothe the rage that was shaking heaven as Landlos, Tornelos and Voltolos withdrew. Larry then parted ways with Ash and his friends as he left with Meloetta after it was rescued. He hoped to return to their quiet life.

character.name: Chihaya-sensei
character.description: Chihaya appears to be the leader of the Flower Garden Opera Troupe. She arrived in the battle area just after Iris had defeated Maya. She complemented Iris on a truly excellent battle and that she was able to beat their top star Maya. Chihaya offered them the job to go on the stage for the Flower Garden Opera Troupe. Not realizing that Ash and Cilan were guys, the three of them quickly ran out of the building as they didn`t want to be discovered by Chihaya and the other girls.

character.name: Soran
character.description: On their way to Higaki City where the Isshu League would be held, Ash and his friends were challenged to a tag battle by Pokémon Trainers that were brothers. Soran is the older of the two brothers and his younger brother is Riiku. They are a bit cocky and overconfident and their dreams don`t always match what is really happening. Together with the sky warrior Warrgle, Soran controls everything in the sky. Soran and Riiku claim to be the world`s number one siblings but they realized after facing Ash and Cilan that they still had a lot of work to do to actually claim that title. Soran and his brother like to use a combination of moves for their attacks and name them appropriate to what the combination produces. This proved to be effective in the tag battle against Ash and Cilan until they also decided to use their own combination of moves which ended up overpowering Soran and Riiku. After realizing that they lost in a double battle, the two brothers decided to blame each other but Cilan decided to help them out and they graciously accepted that help after being humbled in their double battle. After doing a tasting compatibility, Cilan suggested that they both needed to have a Pokémon that could cope with opposing Pokémon whose types they were weak to at the time. Cilan took Soran and Riiku fishing to catch a Water Pokémon. Soran caught a Buoysel to give him an all-around land-sea-air collection. Soran and Riiku then began their training work at improving their tag battles with their new water Pokémon by developing new combination moves.

character.name: Riiku
character.description: On their way to Higaki City where the Isshu League would be held, Ash and his friends were challenged to a tag battle by Pokémon Trainers that were brothers. Riiku is the younger of the two brothers and his older brother is Riiku. They are a bit cocky and overconfident and their dreams don`t always match what is really happening. Together with the earth warrior Mogurew, Riiku controls everything on land. Soran and Riiku claim to be the world`s number one siblings but they realized after facing Ash and Cilan that they still had a lot of work to do to actually claim that title. Riiku and his brother like to use a combination of moves for their attacks and name them appropriate to what the combination produces. This proved to be effective in the tag battle against Ash and Cilan until they also decided to use their own combination of moves which ended up overpowering Soran and Riiku. After realizing that they lost in a double battle, the two brothers decided to blame each other but Cilan decided to help them out and they graciously accepted that help after being humbled in their double battle. After doing a tasting compatibility, Cilan suggested that they both needed to have a Pokémon that could cope with opposing Pokémon whose types they were weak to at the time. Cilan took Soran and Riiku fishing to catch a Water Pokémon. Riiku caught a Heigani to give him an all-around land-sea-air collection. Soran and Riiku then began their training work at improving their tag battles with their new water Pokémon by developing new combination moves.

character.name: Warrgle (Soran)
character.description: Soran`s Warrgle was first seen flying in the air while Ash and his friends were on their way to Higaki City where the Isshu League was to be held. Together with its trainer Soran, the sky warrior Warrgle controls everything in the sky. During tag battles, Soran`s Warrgle pairs up with Riiku`s Mogurew and they use a combination of moves for their attacks and name them appropriate to what the combination produces. Soran`s Warrgle had a tag battle against Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Unfezant. The move combinations proved to be effective in the tag battle against Ash and Cilan until they also decided to use their own combination of moves which ended up overpowering Soran`s Warrgle and Riiku`s Mogurew and they lost the tag battle.

character.name: Mogurew (Riiku)
character.description: Riiku`s Mogurew was first seen popping out of the ground in front of Ash and his friends who were on their way to Higaki City where the Isshu League was to be held. Together with its trainer Riiku, the earth warrior Mogurew controls everything on land. During tag battles, Riiku`s Mogurew pairs up with Soran`s Warrgle and they use a combination of moves for their attacks and name them appropriate to what the combination produces. Riiku`s Mogurew had a tag battle against Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Unfezant. The move combinations proved to be effective in the tag battle against Ash and Cilan until they also decided to use their own combination of moves which ended up overpowering Soran`s Warrgle and Riiku`s Mogurew and they lost the tag battle.

character.name: Shoubu
character.description: Shobu is one of Iris` closest friends and she lives in the Dragon Village where she is studying breeding. Back when the two of them were little, they would often talk about what the world outside the village would be like. Shobu would prefer a life like Iris`, in which she could travel freely. She hoped that once the Dihead the was taking care of evolved into Sazandora, that the Matriarch would let her start a journey too. Once Dihead had evolved into Sazandora and Iris was able to calm it down, Shobu asked the Matriarch if she could go. The matriarch had been waiting for Shobu to ask of her own accord and told her that Iris wasn`t the only special person in the village. She had hoped that Shobu would want to expand her own talents and to move forward and accomplish something of her own accord.

character.name: Virgil
character.description: Virgil was a participant in the Isshu League at Higaki City.

character.name: Crimgan (Shaga)
character.description: Iris` Dragonite wanted to fight under the same conditions as Drayden`s Druddigon, who cannot fly. Everyone thought that Iris was doing well in the battle but Drayden`s Druddigon proved to be more powerful than they had anticipated. Drayden`s Druddigon knocked out Iris` Dragonite with a powerful Dragon Tail attack to give Drayden the victory in the rematch battle. Cilan thought Iris had cornered him, but Drayden was still a few steps ahead. Drayden was trying to get a clear picture of Iris by drawing out their power.

character.name: Martha
character.description: Martha live in Soryu City and works at the Soryu Academy. While Iris was at the Soryu Academy studying to become a Dragon Master, Martha realized that Iris was having a hard time fitting in with the students and studying at the school. Martha made Iris a meal that she was more comfortable eating which Iris found to be delicious and made her feel better. Martha could tell that Iris was so desperate to adapt to to the environment at the academy that she had no room for anything else and though that the food would cheer her up. Drayden, Elder and Martha all have high hopes for Iris and they hope that she will one day return to Soryu City to become the successor Gym Leader of the Soryu Gym.

character.name: Davey
character.description: Davey is a member of the Pokémon Rescue Team and Virgil`s older brother. His father is Jeff is the founder of the Pokémon Rescue Team. Davey is a bit protective of his younger brother Virgil and often got angry at Virgil and told him he was too reckless. As a member of the Pokémon Rescue Squad, Davey does rescue operations together with his Pokémon. The Rescue Squad has a number of teams and Davey has his own team. His father Jeff, who likes helping people, started a voluntary service together with him. Today they co-operate with the Officer Jenny (Isshu) of the city and do rescue operations in various places. Virgil joined after his training journey. After the mission at the dam and reservoir, Davey realized that his brother had become quite mature now and that his training journey helped him become less reckless. Davey often flies helicopter machine number one to his missions and he flew Virgil to the Isshu League in Higaki City before going to drop off some Pokémon for another mission.

character.name: Jeff
character.description: Jeff is the founder and a member of the Pokémon Rescue Team. His son`s are Virgil and Davey. In the case of a calamity, the Pokémon Rescue Team do rescue operations together with their Pokémon. The Pokémon Rescue Squad has several teams and Jeff younger son Virgil runs Team Eievui. Jeff likes helping people, so he started a voluntary service together with his older son Davey and that evolved into the Pokémon Rescue Team. Nowadays, they co-operate with the Officer Jenny (Isshu) of the city and do rescue operations in various places. Jeff often stays at the headquarters can communicates with team members and other entities to relay information. He loves his two sons and was a bit more protective of his younger son Virgil but he realized that he had grown up as well and was able to be a very good member of the Rescue Squad.

character.name: Eievui (Virgil)
character.description: This is Virgil`s eighth Eievui. It loves to be pampered but it`s still an apprentice. Virgil had been trying to get it to decide what kind of rescue missions it wanted to do and which type it want to evolve into so it could graduate from its apprenticeship. Virgil`s Eevee couldn`t decide and Virgil wanted to make sure not to rush it and make sure it thought through it carefully so it would pick the evolution that suits it most. During a battle against some Freegeo at the dam and reservoir, Virgil`s Eevee helped contribute by protecting Virgil`s Flareon and boosting its attacks. While Virgil was busy dealing with the Freegeo`s attacks, Virgil`s Eevee dug a hole down to the basement of the control building which allowed Davey to get out of the building. Virgil realized after those experiences that his Eevee was fine the way it was and that his Eevee Team was now complete.

character.name: Eievui (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Umbreon is the evolved form of Virgil`s Eevee. While Virgil was about Ash`s age, he went out to explore the forest with the first Eievui he had befriended. Getting carried away, he walked in too far. Not only had he become lost in the forest, but the sun had also set; just when he thought all hope was lost, his Eievui evolved into Blacky. Thanks to Virgil`s Umbreon, Virgil got out of the forest and a special bond between him and Eievui was born. None of its moves as an Eevee are known.

character.name: Eifie (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Espeon was first revealed when Ash and Iris tried to climb over some rocks on the path to Higaki City but they came loose and began to fall off the cliff. Virgil`s Espeon rescued them by using its Psychic move to rescue them.

character.name: Glacia (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Glaceon is a member of the Pokémon Rescue Squad`s Team Eiuvui. It was first seen at the ranch but then later accompanied Virgil on a mission to the dam and reservoir where is used Icy Wind to help make a key for the control room door. Isshu League Higaki Tournament Virgil`s Glaceon participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the second round, Virgil was matched up against a trainer with a Lanculus, which Virgil`s Glaceon defeated.

character.name: Blacky (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Umbreon is the evolved form of Virgil`s Eevee. While Virgil was about Ash`s age, he went out to explore the forest with the first Eievui he had befriended. Getting carried away, he walked in too far. Not only had he become lost in the forest, but the sun had also set; just when he thought all hope was lost, his Eievui evolved into Blacky. Thanks to Virgil`s Umbreon, Virgil got out of the forest and a special bond between him and Eievui was born. Isshu League Tournament Virgil`s Umbreon participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round it was matched up against Flora`s Gothitelle where it defeated it and eliminated Flora from the tournament. Virgil`s Umbreon was sent out to rescue Ash`s Pokémon who were cornered by a Dustdas and four Yabukuron after Ash`s Oshawott ate all their food by accident.

character.name: Booster (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Flareon is a member of the Pokémon Rescue Squad`s Team Eiuvui. It was first seen at the ranch but then later accompanied Virgil on a mission to the dam and reservoir where is used Flamethrower to melt the ice in front of the control room door.

character.name: Showers (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Vaporeon is a member of the Pokémon Rescue Squad`s Team Eiuvui. It was first seen at the ranch but then later accompanied Virgil on a mission to the dam and reservoir where is used BubbleBeam on the rusty parts of the control room door to open it. Isshu League Tournament In the first round of the Isshu League, Virgil`s Vaporeon was matched up against Ultimo`s Crustle and easily defeated it. As a result Ultimo was eliminated from the competition.

character.name: Thunders (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Jolteon is a member of the Pokémon Rescue Squad`s Team Eiuvui. It was first seen at the ranch but then later accompanied Virgil on a mission to the dam and reservoir where is used Thunderbolt on the battery to get the emergency power supply operational.

character.name: Leafia (Virgil)
character.description: Virgil`s Leafeon is a member of the Pokémon Rescue Squad`s Team Eiuvui. It was first seen at the ranch but it was not seen on the mission to the dam and reservoir, possibly due to its weakness against ice.

character.name: Kirikizan (Davey)
character.description: Davey`s Bisharp was used to break the ice in front of the control room doors as fire type moves would have damaged the sensitive equipment inside the building.

character.name: Hihidaruma (Davey)
character.description: Davey`s Darmanitan accompanied Davey in its Poké Ball to the dam and reservoir. It used Superpower to bend the pipes to allow Freegeo to get out. It then helped melt the ice to return the dam and reservoir back to normal.

character.name: Mooland (Davey)
character.description: Davey`s Stoutland accompanied Davey in the helicopter to the dam and reservoir. It helped find the entrance to the control room and also found the Freegeo that was stuck in the pipes in the basement.

character.name: Mikael
character.description: Mikael is a Pokémon Trainer that participated in the first round of the Isshu League. He was matched up against Bianca in the first round but he was eliminated from the competition by her.

character.name: Ultimo
character.description: Ultimo is a Pokémon Trainer that participated in the first round of the Isshu League. He was matched up against Virgil in the first round but he was eliminated from the competition by him.

character.name: Kenou
character.description: Kenoh is a Pokémon Trainer that participated in the first round of the Isshu League. He was matched up against Kotetsu in the first round but he was eliminated from the competition by him.

character.name: Raoul
character.description: Raoul is a Pokémon Trainer that participated in the first round of the Isshu League. He was matched up against Stephan in the first round but he was eliminated from the competition by him.

character.name: Miruhog (Mikael)
character.description: Mikael`s Watchog participated in the first round of the Isshu League. It was matched up against Bianca`s Emboar in the first round but Mikael`s Watchog was defeated and as a result Mikael was eliminated from the competition.

character.name: Warrgle (Raoul)
character.description: Raoul`s Braviary participated in the first round of the Isshu League. It was matched up against Stephan`s Zebstrika in the first round but Raoul`s Braviary was defeated and as a result Raoul was eliminated from the competition.

character.name: Iwapalace (Ultimo)
character.description: Ultimo`s Crustle participated in the first round of the Isshu League. It was matched up against Virgil`s Vaporeon in the first round but Ultimo`s Crustle was defeated and as a result Ultimo was eliminated from the competition.

character.name: Shibirudon (Kenou)
character.description: Kenoh`s Eelektross participated in the first round of the Isshu League. It was matched up against Kotetsu`s Ferrothorn in the first round but Kenoh`s Eelektross was defeated and as a result Kenoh was eliminated from the competition.

character.name: Meguroco (Antonio)
character.description: Antonio`s Sandile was briefly seen in the Higaki City Pokémon Center during the Isshu League Tournament just as Ash walks through the Pokémon Center front door.

character.name: Tamagetake (Flora)
character.description: Flora`s Foongus was briefly seen in the Higaki City Pokémon Center during the Isshu League Tournament just as Ash walks through the Pokémon Center front door.

character.name: Lepardas (Kenyan)
character.description: Stephan`s Liepard was revealed in the third round of the Isshu League Higaki Tournament.

character.name: Imotaro
character.description: Imotaro was first seen in a stadium hallway at the Higaki Tournament with a bunch of people celebrating. He was the first trainer ever from Inakano Town to get to the third round of the Isshu League. In the third round he was matched up against Manning who he defeated and Manning eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Okura
character.description: Okura was first seen in a stadium hallway at the Higaki Tournament with a bunch of people celebrating Imotaro victory in his second round match as he was the first trainer ever from Inakano Town to get to the third round of the Isshu League.

character.name: Shibirudon (Imotaro)
character.description: Imotaro`s Eelektross participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round it was matched up against Manning`s Jellicent where it defeated it and eliminated Manning from the tournament.

character.name: Burungel (Marufuji)
character.description: Manning`s Jellicent participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round it was matched up against Imotaro`s Eelektross where it was defeated and Manning was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Gigaiath (Kenta)
character.description: Kenton`s Gigalith participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round it was matched up against Kotetsu`s Riolu where was defeated and Kenton was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Gothiruselle (Flora)
character.description: Flora`s Gothitelle participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round it was matched up against Virgil`s Umbreon where it was defeated and as a result Flora was eliminated from the tournament. It is unknown if Flora`s Gothorita is the same Pokémon in its evolved state as it was not revealed in the series. None of Flora`s Gothitelle moves are known as a result.

character.name: Sazandora (Kotetsu)
character.description: Cameron`s Hydreigon was revealed in the fourth round of the Isshu League Higaki Tournament where it was the first Pokémon that was sent out to battle against Ash. Sazandora is Cameron secret weapon.

character.name: Hihidaruma (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Darmanitan was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshu League in the battle against Katharine.

character.name: Vulgina (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Mandibuzz was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshu League in the battle against Katharine. It was also used in the finals in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Deathkarn (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Cofagrigus was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshu League in the battle against Katharine.

character.name: Hahakomori (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Leavanny was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshu League in the battle against Katharine.

character.name: Dentula (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Galvantula was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshu League in the battle against Katharine.

character.name: Crimgan (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Druddigon was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshu League in the battle against Katharine. It was also used in the finals in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Dredear (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Lilligant was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshue League in the battle against Antonio.

character.name: Tunbear (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Beartic was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshue League in the battle against Antonio.

character.name: Aiant (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Durant was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshue League in the battle against Antonio.

character.name: Gamageroge (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Seismitoad was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshue League in the battle against Antonio.

character.name: Chandela (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Chandelure was used in the quarterfinals of the Isshue League in the battle against Antonio.

character.name: Miruhog (Kotetsu)
character.description: Cameron`s Watchog was used in the semifinals of the Isshue League in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Chandela (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Chandelure was used in the finals of the Isshu League in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Gigaiath (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Gigalith was used in the finals of the Isshu League in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Gamageroge (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Seismitoad was used in the finals of the Isshu League in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Kuitaran (Dino)
character.description: Dino`s Heatmor was used in the finals of the Isshu League in the battle against Virgil.

character.name: Inakano Town no Chourou
character.description: Inakano Town Elder is a member of the cheering squad from the town. He was seen in the halls of the stadium at the Isshu League in Higaki City cheering on Imotaro. He noted that Imotaro was the first Trainer from Inakano Town to make it through the second round of the Isshu League. He has been on the cheering squad for 25 years and he was so happy that his tears won`t stop.

character.name: Chillarmy (Koharu)
character.description: Katharine`s Minccino was briefly seen being held by Katharine while she was talking to another Trainer outside of the Higaki City Pokémon Center.

character.name: Hatoboh (Rikioh)
character.description: Ramone`s Tranquill was briefly seen standing with its Trainer in front of the Higaki City Pokémon Center`s entrance.

character.name: Ishizumai (Ultimo)
character.description: Ultimo`s Dwebble was briefly seen together with its Trainer outside the Higaki City Pokémon Center.
